name: Bad Bots - GMTK 2020 Jam
description:
This is my submission for GMTK Game Jam 2020.

The theme was "out of control". Everything was made by me in 48hrs.

In this game you defend last of the world's forests against crazed harvesting robots!

Defend the trees as they provide you with oxygen, and capture the checkpoints to complete the level. 

Controls:

WASD to move

CLICK to smash bad 

SPACE (near a beacon) to pick it up or drop it. 

SPACE (near checkpoint) to set spawn point

Friendly robots:

Defeating a big robot makes its smaller minions friendly!

Friendly robots plant trees. They will follow the beacon (small black box) which spawns when big robots die. Use that to repopulate the forest!

Watch your oxygen level when you leave the trees' range!

Enjoy!

Game made with Unity, Models with Blender and sounds with Ableton and Cubase.

Both HTML and Windows builds are available to play.

Github: https://github.com/miwamiwa/outofcontrol
